servicePrincipalClientId.value: <The client ID of the service principal that the web app uses to manage APIM>

servicePrincipalClientSecret.value: <The client secret for the service principal>

servicePrincipalObjectId.value: <The object ID for the service principal>

servicePrincipalTenantId.value: <The ID of the tenant that the service principal resides in>

stripeApiKey.value: <Value of Stripe 'App Key' API key created as part of pre-requisites>

stripePublicKey.value: <Value of Stripe 'Publishable key' from Stripe standard keys>

adyenApiKey.value: <Value of Adyen API key retrieved as part of pre-requisites>

adyenClientKey.value: <Value of Adyen client key retrieved as part of pre-requisites>
